channel.title: ujjujjuj's blog
channel.description: Blogs about random tech stuff, will probably add new posts every month.

item.title: Hacking AICTE's "Happiness App"
item.author: ujjujjuj
item.description: A few months back, my college sent every student an email asking us to download an app called YOL - YourOneLife which claims to be approved by AICTE. For those of you who don't know, AICTE stands for the All India Council for Technical Education. I don't exactly know what this council does but it comes under the Indian ministry of education so it must be something serious.
